GNIS feature ID |blank1_info = 1267560 }} Salem is a city in the eastern part of the U.S. state of South Dakota. It is the county seat of McCook County, and it became a city in 1880. At the 2020 census, 1,325 people lived there. ==References== ==Other websites== *City of Salem website Category:County seats in South Dakota Category:Cities in South Dakota Category:1880 establishments in Dakota Territory
